name: DrScentDiffuser
0:
”Alexa, doctor scent spray”
”Alexa, set schedule between ten am and five pm with grade four in doctor scent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doctor scent
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Dr. Scent Diffuser skill for Amazon Alexa help you to control your aroma diffuser to turn it on and off and create and stop the schedule as required.

It works with the supported devices (it will be written on the box if it's supported)

You can make your home smell like the hotels with Dr. Scent Diffuser and with Alexa you can now turn it on without the need to access the mobile application and to combine it in your smart home system and your daily routine."

To set up an Dr. Scent Diffuser skill and start using follow these steps:

1:- Create an Amazon Account, If you already have an Amazon account, you can use those credentials to log in.

2:- Navigate to Amzazon Alexa App

3:- Once logged in, navigate to the "Skills & Games" section. This is where you can find your Dr. Scent Diffuser skill.

4:- Search For Dr.Scent Diffuser

5:- Click on Launch to Open Dr.Scent Diffuser Skill.

6:- Login with Amazon Account to start using the Skill.

7:- Once Logged in, it will ask you to setup your Dr.Scent Diffuser Device.
